alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 2:31AM MDT until November 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Converse County Lower Elevations, East Platte County and Central Laramie County including Cheyenne, Wheatland, and Douglas. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Widespread strong crosswinds could create hazardous travel for all motorists on Interstate 25 between mile markers 5 and 170...especially for light weight and high profile vehicles...including light load semis and those towing camper trailers.
info.instruction: PA High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County
